info.title: Software Voting Machine API
info.description: This API allows us to manage all related endpoints to our software voting machine app.

get.description: Returns a list of all countries in the database.

post.description: Creates a new country with the given data.

get.description: Retrieves the country with the specified ID.

put.description: Updates the country with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.description: Deletes the country with the specified ID.

post.description: Creates a new email with the given data.

get.description: Retrieves the email with the specified ID.

put.description: Updates the email with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.description: Deletes the email with the specified ID.

get.summary: Get an email by email address
get.description: Retrieves the email with the specified email address.

post.summary: Creates a JWT token for a user
post.description: Creates a JWT token for a user

401.description: Couldn't create a token, invalid credentials

post.description: Creates a new option with the given data.

get.description: Returns a list of all options in the database.
Retrieves the option with the specified ID.

put.description: Updates the option with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.description: Deletes the option with the specified ID.

get.summary: Get an option by session ID
get.description: Retrieves the option with the specified session ID.

post.description: Creates a new organization with the given data.

get.description: Returns a list of all organizations in the database.
Retrieves the organization with the specified ID.

put.description: Updates the organization with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.description: Deletes the organization with the specified ID.

post.description: Creates a new password with the given data.

get.description: Retrieves the password with the specified user ID.

put.summary: Update a password by user ID
put.description: Updates the password with the given userID using the provided data.

delete.summary: Delete a password by user ID
delete.description: Deletes the password with the specified user ID.

post.description: Creates a new profile status with the given data.

get.description: Returns a list of all profile statuses in the database.

get.summary: Get a profile status by ID
get.description: Retrieves the profile status with the specified ID.

put.summary: Update a profile status by ID
put.description: Updates the profile status with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.summary: Delete a profile status by ID
delete.description: Deletes the profile status with the specified ID.

post.description: Creates a new role with the given data.

get.description: Returns a list of all roles in the database.
Retrieves the role with the specified ID.

put.description: Updates the role with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.description: Deletes the role with the specified ID.

post.description: Creates a new user with the given data.

get.description: Returns a list of all users in the database.
Retrieves the user with the specified ID.

put.description: Updates the user with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.description: Deletes the user with the specified ID.

post.description: Creates a new vote with the given data.

get.description: Returns a list of all votes in the database.

put.description: Updates the vote with the given token using the provided data.

delete.description: Deletes the vote with the specified token.

post.description: Creates a new vote submission with the given data.

get.description: Returns a list of all vote submissions in the database.

put.summary: Update a vote submission by ID
put.description: Updates the vote submission with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.summary: Delete a vote submission by ID
delete.description: Deletes the vote submission with the specified ID.

post.description: Creates a new voting session with the given data.

get.description: Returns a list of all voting sessions in the database.

get.summary: Get a voting session by ID
get.description: Retrieves the voting session with the specified ID.

put.summary: Update a voting session by ID
put.description: Updates the voting session with the given ID using the provided data.

delete.summary: Delete a voting session by ID
delete.description: Deletes the voting session with the specified ID.
